nodes.id: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部
en: Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门之一。初期主管钢铁工业和有色金属工业，后主要负责统一领导和归口管理全国冶金工业（不含有色金属工业）的生产建设工作。1998年3月在国务院机构改革中被撤销。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. Initially in charge of the iron and steel industry and non-ferrous metals industry, it later primarily managed the production and construction of the national metallurgical industry (excluding non-ferrous metals). It was abolished in March 1998 during the State Council's institutional reform.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

en: Constituent Department of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的法定组成单位，包括各部、各委员会、中国人民银行、审计署。
description.en: The statutory constituent units of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, including various ministries, commissions, the People's Bank of China, and the National Audit Office.

nodes.id: 第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
en: First Session of the 9th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 于1998年3月举行的全国人民代表大会会议，会议通过了国务院机构改革方案，决定撤销冶金工业部。
description.en: A session of the National People's Congress held in March 1998, which approved the State Council's institutional reform plan and decided to abolish the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

description.zh-cn: 1998年由中华人民共和国国务院提出，并经第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议审议通过的关于政府机构调整的方案。
description.en: A plan proposed by the State Council of the People's Republic of China in 1998 and approved by the First Session of the 9th National People's Congress regarding the adjustment of government institutions.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家冶金工业局

description.zh-cn: 1998年由原冶金工业部改制而成，为国家经济贸易委员会管理的主管冶金行业的行政机构。
description.en: Reformed from the former Ministry of Metallurgical Industry in 1998, it is an administrative agency under the State Economic and Trade Commission responsible for the metallurgical industry.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 1st National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国重工业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国重工业部
en: Ministry of Heavy Industry of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府政务院的一个部门，1956年被撤销，分设为冶金工业部、化学工业部、建筑材料工业部。
description.en: A department of the Government Administration Council of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, which was abolished in 1956 and split into the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, Ministry of Chemical Industry, and Ministry of Building Materials Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾在文化大革命期间担任冶金工业部军代表。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the military representative to the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾在文化大革命期间担任冶金工业部副军代表。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the deputy military representative to the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 冶金工业部革命委员会

zh-cn: 冶金工业部革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，中华人民共和国冶金工业部的临时权力机构。
description.en: The provisional organ of power of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1975年由国务院成立，旨在加强对钢铁工业的领导。
description.en: Established by the State Council in 1975 to strengthen leadership over the iron and steel industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理，并担任钢铁工业领导小组组长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Premier of the State Council and headed the Leading Group for the Iron and Steel Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任冶金工业部副部长及部长助理，并担任钢铁工业领导小组副组长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister and Assistant Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, and as deputy head of the Leading Group for the Iron and Steel Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任冶金工业部部长和副部长，并担任钢铁工业领导小组副组长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Minister and Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, and as deputy head of the Leading Group for the Iron and Steel Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理，并担任钢铁工业领导小组政委。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Premier of the State Council and as Political Commissar of the Leading Group for the Iron and Steel Industry.

nodes.id: 国家有色金属工业管理总局

zh-cn: 国家有色金属工业管理总局

description.zh-cn: 1980年成立，直属国务院，由冶金工业部代管，负责管理全国有色金属工业。
description.en: Established in 1980, directly under the State Council and managed by the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, responsible for managing the national non-ferrous metals industry.

nodes.id: 冶金工业部黄金管理局

zh-cn: 冶金工业部黄金管理局

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部的内设职能局，负责黄金工业的管理。
description.en: An internal functional bureau of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the management of the gold industry.

description.zh-cn: 原负责管理中国黄金工业的机构，1993年并入冶金工业部。
description.en: The former agency responsible for managing China's gold industry, which was merged into the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责机构编制管理工作的机构。
description.en: The commission of the People's Republic of China responsible for the management of public sector organization and staffing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责调节国民经济运行。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for regulating the national economy.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责党组织和干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for party organization and cadre work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长，后任国家冶金工业局局长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry and later as Director of the State Bureau of Metallurgical Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长，后任国家冶金工业局副局长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry and later as Deputy Director of the State Bureau of Metallurgical Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长，后任国家冶金工业局副局长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry and later as Deputy Director of the State Bureau of Metallurgical Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国工程师，曾任冶金工业部总工程师，后任国家冶金工业局总工程师。
description.en: A Chinese engineer who served as Chief Engineer of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry and later as Chief Engineer of the State Bureau of Metallurgical Industry.

nodes.id: 中国有色金属工业总公司

zh-cn: 中国有色金属工业总公司

description.zh-cn: 1983年成立，直属国务院，负责全国有色金属工业的生产经营。
description.en: Established in 1983, directly under the State Council, responsible for the production and operation of the national non-ferrous metals industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国冶金工业部首任部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, the first Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中华人民共和国冶金工业部最后一任部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, the last Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who was a member of the Revolutionary Committee of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who was a member of the Revolutionary Committee of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Chairman of the Revolutionary Committee of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长、党组书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister and Party Group Secretary of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister and Chief Engineer of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister and Chief Engineer of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长、宝钢集团董事长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China and Chairman of Baosteel Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长，后调任物资部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China, and was later transferred to be Vice Minister of the Ministry of Materials.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国物资部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国物资部

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长、总工程师。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister and Chief Engineer of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国冶金工业部副部长、首钢总公司党委书记兼董事长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China, and as Party Secretary and Chairman of Shougang Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中纪委驻冶金部纪检组组长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the head of the CCDI's Discipline Inspection Group stationed at the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任冶金工业部供应和销售局局长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Director of the Supply and Sales Bureau of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任冶金工业部计划司副司长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as Deputy Director of the Planning Department of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部是中华人民共和国国务院的上级机构为国务院的组成部门。
description.en: The Ministry of Metallurgical Industry was a constituent department under its superior body, the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部
relationships.target: 国务院组成部门

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部是国务院的组成部门之一。
description.en: The Ministry of Metallurgical Industry was one of the constituent departments of the State Council.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

description.zh-cn: 1956年5月12日，第一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会第四十次会议决定设立中华人民共和国冶金工业部。
description.en: On May 12, 1956, the 40th session of the Standing Committee of the 1st National People's Congress decided to establish the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国重工业部

description.zh-cn: 1956年5月12日，第一届全国人民代表大会常务委员会第四十次会议决定撤销中华人民共和国重工业部。
description.en: On May 12, 1956, the 40th session of the Standing Committee of the 1st National People's Congress decided to abolish the Ministry of Heavy Industry of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

description.zh-cn: 1998年3月，第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过《关于国务院机构改革方案的决定》，撤销了冶金工业部。
description.en: In March 1998, the First Session of the 9th National People's Congress passed the 'Decision on the Plan for the Restructuring of the State Council', abolishing the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

relationships.source: 第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 国家冶金工业局

description.zh-cn: 1998年3月，第九届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过《关于国务院机构改革方案的决定》，决定设置国家冶金工业局。
description.en: In March 1998, the First Session of the 9th National People's Congress passed the 'Decision on the Plan for the Restructuring of the State Council', deciding to establish the State Bureau of Metallurgical Industry.

relationships.target: 国家经济贸易委员会

description.zh-cn: 国家冶金工业局是国家经济贸易委员会管理的行政机构。
description.en: The State Bureau of Metallurgical Industry was an administrative agency managed by the State Economic and Trade Commission.

relationships.target: 冶金工业部革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 1970年6月22日，中共中央批准成立冶金工业部革命委员会。
description.en: On June 22, 1970, the Central Committee of the CCP approved the establishment of the Revolutionary Committee of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 冶金工业部革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 1970年6月22日，国务院批准成立冶金工业部革命委员会。
description.en: On June 22, 1970, the State Council approved the establishment of the Revolutionary Committee of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 钢铁工业领导小组

description.zh-cn: 1975年9月21日，国务院成立钢铁工业领导小组。
description.en: On September 21, 1975, the State Council established the Leading Group for the Iron and Steel Industry.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 国家有色金属工业管理总局

description.zh-cn: 1980年5月12日，国务院批准成立国家有色金属工业管理总局。
description.en: On May 12, 1980, the State Council approved the establishment of the State Administration of Nonferrous Metals Industry.

relationships.source: 国家有色金属工业管理总局
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

description.zh-cn: 国家有色金属工业管理总局由冶金工业部代管。
description.en: The State Administration of Nonferrous Metals Industry was managed by the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 国家黄金管理局

description.zh-cn: 1993年4月19日，国务院决定将国家黄金管理局并入冶金工业部。
description.en: On April 19, 1993, the State Council decided to merge the State Gold Administration Bureau into the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国冶金工业部

description.zh-cn: 1993年4月19日，国家黄金管理局并入冶金工业部，成为其内设职能局。
description.en: On April 19, 1993, the State Gold Administration Bureau was merged into the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry, becoming its internal functional bureau.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 中国有色金属工业总公司

description.zh-cn: 1983年，冶金工业部的有色金属局改制为直属国务院的中国有色金属工业总公司。
description.en: In 1983, the Nonferrous Metals Bureau of the Ministry of Metallurgical Industry was reorganized into the China National Non-ferrous Metals Industry Corporation, directly under the State Council.
